title: Linkup | The best link tool
main_title: Only One Link For Your Need
main_subtitle: Create a link with all your contacts inside
adv1_subtitle: Create your LinkUp link and use it everywhere. There's no need to remember every social media account, just use LinkUp!
adv2_subtitle: You can put anything your subscribers might try to find on your link page. It is very good if everything is in one place.
adv3_subtitle: Intuitive link builder make your life much easily. Just enter link and choose one of beautiful themes
